title: Plat Duo Bot lane LF Team to join.
body:
Hey guys. 

My support and I are keen to join a team as their bot lane. My current rank is Plat 5 but in promos to p4. My support is ranked p2. We have been duoing together and practicing and we both are very positive. 

We really wish to join a team!!!

Please add my main " I love miya" We look forward to meeting u xD
